title: Rare and Beautiful Gold Coast Gem Available Aug 1
posting_body: ['Rare and newly-renovated Gold Coast gem.', 'Steps across the street from Oak Street Beach, this spacious 775 sq-foot vintage 1-bed is situated on the 4th floor of a beautiful Gold Coast low-rise with old-world European influences and view of the gated, landscaped courtyard.', 'Four units each floor provides a quiet, private and safe home sanctuary.', 'Located in a prime spot for summers at the beach, grill-outs with friends, or shopping on Michigan avenue, this centrally-located haven offers a charming space to enjoy all the Gold Coast has to offer, but just 5-10 minutes from the loop for all of the action.', '-  Unit features high-ceilings, sun light in every room, spacious living room and bedroom; original bay windows in both living and bedroom', '- Quiet and safe; across the street from Oak Street beach', '- Courtyard view with fountain', '- Wood-burning fireplace', '- Gas stove', '- Short walk to Lincoln Park and shopping', '- Dog and cat friendly', '- 6-machine laundry room located on 1st floor with card', '- Plenty of closet space and in-unit storage', 'Renovations include:', '- New chandelier installation in living room & bedroom', '- Built-in surround sound speakers throughout apartment', '- New kitchen countertops and lighting', '- Cabinet refurb', '- Fireplace inspection and clean', '- Dimmers and new electric throughout apartment', '- Fresh paint throughout', '- New entry and bathroom lighting', '- Window repair', 'Included in rent:', '- Extended cable with HBO', '- Internet', '- Water', '- Gas', '*Electricity not included']
